exercises.text: Ovo su tenisice u _____ ću ići na Inmusic Festival.
exercises.explanation: Use 'kojima' or 'kojim' (locative plural) - 'in which' referring to tennis shoes (tenisice). Both forms are grammatically correct.

exercises.text: Zagreb je grad u _____ teče rijeka Sava.
exercises.explanation: Use 'kojem' or 'kojemu' (locative masculine singular) - 'in which' referring to the city (grad). Both short and long forms are correct.

exercises.text: Volim piti kavu s ljudima s _____ ne moram puno pričati.
exercises.explanation: Use 'kojima' or 'kojim' (instrumental plural) - 'with whom' referring to people (ljudima). Both forms are grammatically correct.

exercises.text: Nažalost, ne sviđa mi se knjiga _____ si kupila mami za rođendan – dosadna je!
exercises.explanation: Use 'koju' (accusative feminine singular) - 'which' as direct object referring to book (knjiga).

exercises.text: Bruce Springsteen je pjevač _____ uvijek nosi traperice.
exercises.explanation: Use 'koji' (nominative masculine singular) - 'who' as subject referring to singer (pjevač).
